amendment.description: To extend certain municipal health service demonstration projects.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1033 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1033 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Mikulski. (consideration: CR S8644-8645, S8647; text as modified: CR S8644-8645) To extend certain municipal health service demonstration projects.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1033 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Mikulski.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1033 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
